snippet.title: Riptide GP Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Set against the backdrop of a futuristic Earth, Riptide GP is a console-quality water racing game for Tegra-powered Android tablets and phones that features daredevil watercyclists rocketing through canals and rivers across a dynamic, ever changing surface of glittering water.  Its Supercross on water, played out on twisting, undulating waterpark racetracks.

From Vector Unit, the developers who brought you Hydro Thunder Hurricane for the Xbox 360.
